description: This file contains functions for generating C++ header and source files for JSON-RPC API definitions based on a provided schema. It includes logic for handling class and enum generation, versioning, and stub code, with configuration-based conditional processing.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file containing JSON-RPC API declarations, including includes and header guards.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function to generate classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC code for a JSON schema into C++ source files based on configuration flags.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
